sub_title: Robotics Expert | Web Freelancer | Software Developer
summary:
With over 7 years of professional development experience and two degrees under my belt (BA + MA) solving your business’s technical challenges is my number one priority. 

When we work together you’ll be working with a deep and varied skill set. You’ll be working with someone who has extended knowledge in all the major areas of software development and is fluent in Python, C, and C++. You’ll also be working with someone who has experience in project management, lead developer, and engineering roles. This means there are few problems that I haven’t solved before.

Here are a few notable career wins so far:
 
- Building a startup that’s helped over 1.5 million people suffering from color blindness perceive color better.

- Made the biggest database with homicide data in the Netherlands and a platform to support crime investigation.

 - Working on the research and development of different applications of drones like firefighting drones, ATEX drones, drones for crime investigation and more.

- Managing a 10+ team that ensured the safe integration and operation of drones.

Also, are a few kind words from Velin Georgiev, Cloud Solutions Architect and Microsoft MVP.

“Dimitar is a young visionary with innovative thinking, leadership attitude, and incredible talent” 

Thanks, Velin!

projects.title: Cold Case
projects.description:
The main goal of the project is to build the largest database of homicides in Netherlands and also to develop a tool that will help police officers in solving active and cold cases. Behind the tool sits artificial intelligence that will help solve cases and make the work of police officers easier and more expeditious.
The project is made with the partnership of the Politie, Saxion University of applied science, Pandora Intelligence, Icologiq, Tech for future and with the support of Ministry of justice.

contributors.headline: Robotics Expert | Web Freelancer | Software Developer

projects.title: AIRIO - Mobile Air Quality Station
projects.description: Airio is a mobile air station that can be easily installed in vehicles or hard to reach places. The aim of the project is to monitor the quality of the air in a larger area. Also to develop a real-time air monitoring system and make to make the whole project cheap and accessible for the people.

contributors.headline: Robotics Expert | Web Freelancer | Software Developer

projects.title: Firefighting Drone Laboratory
projects.description:
The main goal of the project is to give firefighters the opportunity to understand whether a fire is radioactive or poisonous and also to know where it started from anyhow easily to put it out. To make this whole measurement safe for firefighters, drones are used.
The project is made with the partnership of the Brandweer, Saxion University of applied science, DroneExpert and Tech for future.

contributors.headline: Robotics Expert | Web Freelancer | Software Developer

projects.title: Dalton - software for colorblind people
projects.description: Dalton is a software allowing people with different kinds of color blindness (color vision deficiency) to see more colors. Thanks to the efforts of my tireless team of 3+ business and technical developers we could make the software work properly and promote it. And in this way we helped over 1,500,000 people see the world in color.

contributors.headline: Robotics Expert | Web Freelancer | Software Developer

projects.title: Catttle Counter - Counting sheep has never been easier!
projects.description: The aim of the project is to monitor and count the livestock of farmers in an easy and innovative way with a drone. In this way, they will have complete control over their cattle and will know if all the sheep or cows are present.

contributors.headline: Robotics Expert | Web Freelancer | Software Developer

profile_positions.description: Being part of a research group 'Technologies for Criminal Investigations'. Mainly focus of Cold Case project - web development, AI and ML development, Data Science, Data Mining and etc. I am part of two research lines: Data Science and CrimeBots (Robots for Crime Investigation)
profile_positions.title: Researcher

profile_positions.description: The Emerging Technologies Integration Cluster aims to support the integration of emerging technologies in society in ethical, legal, social, cultural, economic, technological and environmental aspects, with a focus on security, safety, privacy space and protection of personal data and the identity of each of the stakeholders in these processes.
profile_positions.title: Member Of The Management Board

company.name: United Drone Community // Обединено Дрон Общество

profile_positions.company: United Drone Community // Обединено Дрон Общество
profile_positions.description: With the team of Research and Development department of United Drone Community we are developing innovative projects in the field of aviation, to make safe integration and operation of drones in the airspace, in aviation, legal, technical and ethical aspects. My role is to manage our R&D team of 10+ people, to do research, planning, developing software and embedded systems.
profile_positions.title: Research and Development Project Manager

profile_positions.description: As Research and Development Engineer at Zekeng, I was responsible for the research and development of the projects AIRIO and BOXMETRIX. With the help of the team I fully develop the project AIRIO -mobile air station that can be easily installed in vehicles or difficult to reach places. The aim of the project is to monitor the quality of the air in a larger area. Also to develop a real-time air monitoring system and to make the whole project cheap and accessible for the people.  I was mainly dealing with hardware, embedded software - C and C++, Internet of things, databases and web programming.
profile_positions.title: Research And Development Engineer

profile_positions.description: One of my main tasks as a partner and also machine learning and  NLP software developer in the Cold Case project is to build a database of active and cold cases. Software is developed that searches and listens on the internet for new and old cases. A OCR was also programmed so that cases could be retrieved from archives. Then a database is built with over 11 500 cases dating from 1890 to the present day. There are cases even a few minutes ago. The main of aim the project is to help the work of the police officers. The project is made with the partnership of the Police, Saxion University, Pandora Intelligence, Icologiq, Tech for future and with the support of Ministry of justice.
profile_positions.title: Machine Learning  and NLP Software Developer

profile_positions.description: As Electrical and electronics engineer at Saxion University of Applied Sciences, I was part of the team responsible for the research and development of the firefighting drone laboratory.The main goal of the project was to give firefighters the opportunity to understand whether a fire is radioactive or poisonous and also to know where it started from and how easily to put it out. I part of this project was developing the embedded systems, computer vision, machine learning, embedded software and graphical user interface.
profile_positions.title: Electrical and electronics engineer

profile_positions.description: I was the founder of the startup Dalton. Dalton is a software allowing people with different kinds of color blindness (color vision deficiency) to see more colors. Thanks to the efforts of my tireless team of 3+ business and technical developers we could make the software work properly and promote it. And in this way we helped over 1,500,000 people see the world in color.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description: I was the founder and the team lead of SpaceR which is organization that aims to develop robotics in Bulgaria and stimulate the interest of young people in robotics. Our team of 12 members organized a series of events, robotics competitions and training to promote robotics in society. We were also part of the opening of several robotics clubs in the country and their funding.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description: I was intern Server Administrator in Hewlett-Packard in a team of 6 members. I was involved in the assembling and maintenance of the server configuration and connecting them in the network of the company.
profile_positions.title: Server Administrator

profile_positions.description: As Embedded engineer at Electroninvest, I developed 5+ embedded systems projects in field of Smart Home systems and Internet of Things (IoT). I was mainly responsible for the embedded programming – C and  C++ and the hardware development with Altium.
profile_positions.title: Embedded Engineer

volunteer_experiences.description: The Sofia Science Festival is the one and only Bulgarian festival showcasing the achievements of contemporary scientists and young explorers from Bulgaria and abroad. I helped at the robotics stand where NAO and RoboCups robots were shown to the audience. My help was expressed mainly in communication with people.

I am one of the co-creator of the Project "Drone ARENA": demonstrating and exploring the capabilities of the drones in a fun and unforgettable way, through organizing competitions, training, seminars, lectures, shows and demonstrations.The main mission is to give innovative flying technologies the chance to be integrated into society and to give voice to their capabilities. The team consists of experts in various fields related to new technologies and remote control systems.

Every year, the first Saturday of October dedicated to the Saxion Technology Day. As part of the Science Weekend Saxion opens its doors to young and old. See and experience during the Saxion Technology Day how nice and surprising the wonderful world of technology can be! I helped organize the event and organized the rest of the student to present our university in the best way and to show people the magic of electronics.

volunteer_experiences.role: PR and Chairman Committee of Opleidingscommissie for Electrical and Electronic Engineering
volunteer_experiences.description: Being part of the Committee of Opleidingscommissie for Electrical and Electronic Engineering I held the position of Public Relationships Officer and was later promoted to Chairman. I was mainly dealing with communication with people, relation management, research and management. One of my tasks was to find a way to promote the Committee of Opleidingscommissie among the students.
